subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Scott Clemmensen made 33 saves, Jamie Langenbrunner and Zach Parise each had a goal and an assist, and the Devils beat the visiting Montreal Canadiens, 4-1, on Friday night.
snippet: Scott Clemmensen made 33 saves, Jamie Langenbrunner and Zach Parise each had a goal and an assist, and the Devils beat the visiting Montreal Canadiens, 4-1, on Friday night.
